sentences.en: a woman’s decision on whether or not to terminate the pregnancy
sentences.cn: 女子关于是否终止妊娠的决定

sentences.en: After a lot of agonizing she decided to terminate the pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 经历一番痛苦挣扎后，她决定终止妊娠。

sentences.en: Any party has no right to terminate this contract without another party's agreement.
sentences.cn: 未经另一方当事人同意,任何当事人均无权终止合同.

sentences.en: Either party shall not terminate the contract without notice in advance.
sentences.cn: 任何一方不得在不预先通知的情况下终止合同.

sentences.en: Grace began now to be anxious to terminate the interview.
sentences.cn: 现在格雷丝开始急于要结束这次探访.

sentences.en: He had never seen the instrument that was to terminate his life.
sentences.cn: 他不曾看见过将要了结他的生命的那种机械.

sentences.en: He insisted I fomenting dissent, and he said he would have to terminate me.
sentences.cn: 他一口咬定我煽动不满, 还说要解聘我.
大多数名词的复数形式是以s结尾的.

sentences.en: Of course, we can just terminate the contract with those who were employed last year.
sentences.cn: 当然, 我们可以终止与那些去年才雇用的工人的合同.

sentences.en: The court ruled that the contract must be terminated.
sentences.cn: 法庭裁决该合同必须终止。

sentences.en: The President called Kennedy in and suggested he terminate his association with the glamorous movie star.
sentences.cn: 总统召见肯尼迪,建议他中断与这位迷人的电影明星的关系.

sentences.en: This train will terminate at Taunton.
sentences.cn: 这列火车的终点站是汤顿。

sentences.en: to terminate a pregnancy (= to perform or have an abortion )
Truth is the function of the beliefs that start and terminate among them.
sentences.cn: 真理是信念的功能,信念既源于事实又终结于事实.

sentences.en: We had to terminate our mount of the summit.
You have no right to terminate the contract.

words.tran_cn: 终结的；决定的；结尾的；限定的
终结者；终止子；明暗界限
终止；结束；终结（terminate的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: if something terminates, or if you terminate it, it ends

trans.tran_cn: 结束，使终结，解雇，到达终点站

trans.tran_en: if something terminates, or if you terminate it, it ends
